title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 13 March 2015 - XWiki
content:

10:38 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
10:41 <tmortagne> Enygma`: Hi  
10:41 <tmortagne> in case you did not seen it "Rule violated for bundle XWiki Platform - WatchList - API: instructions covered ratio is 0.05, but expected minimum is 0.06"  
10:43 <tmortagne> has quit  
10:44 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
10:50 <Enygma`> Hi tmortagne. Ok. thanks  
10:59 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
11:29 <Inge-> .  
11:59 <ericq> has joined #xwiki  
13:17 <lucaa> has quit  
13:47 <vmassol> Enygma`: can my commit still count for yesterday's BFD?  
13:47 <vmassol> I started fixing it yesterday but could only finish now  
13:51 <vmassol> guys, I wouldn't mind another set of eyes for the commit I've just done, especially from tmortagne (since he worked on that code in the past) :)  
13:52 <tmortagne> vmassol: I did not worked on that part, only a lister that was calling existing Watchlist API to make a document watched  
13:52 <vmassol> tmortagne: blame tells me you're the author of getWebAppPath() in XWiki :)  
13:52 <vmassol> this is what I've modified  
13:54 <Enygma`> vmassol: I was just making the blogpost. If you are quick enough, your fix might get counted :)  
13:54 <Enygma`> \*quick to label it  
13:54 <vmassol> ok let me label it now :)  
13:54 <vmassol> one  
13:54 <vmassol> \*done  
13:54 <Enygma`> k :)  
13:54 <tmortagne> vmassol: ludovic patch from Dec 2008 ;) not sure I remember everything  
13:55 <vmassol> ok I'm also worried when I change oldcore stuff like this  
13:55 <vmassol> if you can have a quick look to see if you see anything that might be wrong, that would help  
13:55 <vmassol> s/also/always  
13:56 <vmassol> basically I've added support for specifying a root webapp in xwiki.cfg  
13:56 <vmassol> (using xwiki.webapppath)  
13:56 <vmassol> and I've refactored a bit the code  
13:57 <vmassol> one thing I need to check is if URLgetPath() does always start with "/"  
13:58 <vmassol> I assumed that in existing code but I haven't reverified it  
13:58 <vmassol> I think it's always true  
13:58 <vmassol> since you always have a "/" after the server part  
14:00 <Enygma`> vmassol: wonder why your issue won`t get on the list. Maybe some cache involved?  
14:00 <vmassol> Enygma`: the dates are ok?  
14:00 <Enygma`>  resolved >= "2015/03/11" AND resolved <= "2015/03/13"  
14:00 <Enygma`> so yes  
14:00 <vmassol> server date is set correctly?  
14:01 <Enygma`> err... the issue says it`s resolved on 2015-03-13T14:49+0200  
14:01 <vmassol> that's probably why 2015/03/13 must be 2015/03/13T00:00  
14:02 <vmassol> (or something like that)  
14:09 <Enygma`> vmassol: works with  resolved <= "2015/03/13 23:59"  
14:09 <vmassol> ok thanks  
14:37 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
14:37 <vmassol> FTR I'm finishing the move of class wizard pages from XE to platform (I had started before going on holidays)
